rukus.text: Ne amasila kosikosi kamunyoola karulana nende kemikhono chienyu chikholele, ne aleshelanga amanji
Ne enywe shimwakhashila khushialo tawe, ne mubula umulindi nohomba ubakhonya ulali Nyasaye tawe
Ne mubimanyisio bibie ni ebiilukhanga khumatsi nibitsia nibikalukha shinga tsingulu
Niyenya ayenzesia omuyeka, ni bitongâ€™a halala nibiemele khunyanza, toto muako khulimwo nende ebimanyisio khubuli wisumilisia omukhupi muno wa orio
Nohomba abitibie mumatsi, khukabakhola ne aleshelanga amanji
Nekho bamanye balia bayingana khubimanyisio biefu mbu babula habundu abelushila
Ne biosi biamwahebwa ni omwikhoyo kwobulamu bwokhushialo, ne bili ewa Nyasaye nebilayi bilaliwa tawe, khubalia basuubila mana nibesika Nyasaye wabu Omulesi yenyene
Ne balia beyikalilanga abionono ebikhongo, nende eshifwolo, nenibasinyisibwa baleshelanga
Nebalia bafuchililanga Nyasaye wabu Omulesi mana balaamanga khatsotso, ne amakhuwa kabu basanjilananga, ne khubia khubakabalile barusinjia
Ne omurungo kwa amabii, ni amabii shinga ako. Kho ulia uleshela, mana yakasia omulembe omurungo kukwe kuli khu Nyasaye, toto ye shiyayanza abetsimbi tawe
Ne balia behabinanga nibakholelwe amabii, babula injila yokhufunaanibwa
Bafunaanibungwa nibalia bakholelanga Abandu amabii, ne bafuranga khushialo munjila ilali yatoto tawe, abo balinyoola eshinyasio eshilulu
Ne ulia wifwila mana yaleshela, toto ako niko amakhuwa kenyekha
